name: Simple Google with Fixed Areas
description:
Fixed navigation bar, left side menu and input box in Google search result pages.
Old style navigation bar in Google top page and Seach result pages.
Disabled instant preview and so on. 
I didn't tested enough at English pages though I tested this at www.google.co.jp and Japanese pages of www.google.com.
additional_info:
20111215 The first issue tested with Newest Google Chrome and its chones, Opera 11, Safari 5, Firefox 8 and Internet Explorer 9.
20111215 The second issue for bug fix on Google Image Search.
20111216 If you want to use The Instant Search, please add two lines as below.
         .sfbg.nojsv { display: none !important; }
         #searchform { position: fixed !important; }
20120226 Apply for New UI in Google Search to prevent for the top of search results to vanish.
20120226 Block [Login] button in new UI.
